name: Im not a Russian
description:
Made in 48 Hours for IGA Game Jam!

THEME: Super Secret & Super Mysterious

Our game is about government espionage in the middle of the cold war, you control a Russian who needs to deliver a series of secret documents, but only to the right people! Don't let these documents fall into the wrong hands!

CONTROLS
WASD - Move
E - Show/hide documents

CREDITS
Danilo Magdaleno (souzanod) - Programmer
Renan Prates  (renanprates) - 3D Artist
Ulisses Caramori (Lostodissey) - 3D Artist, Animator

MUSIC
Slynk - The Jam
Silent Partner - Chess pieces
